## Libraries and data

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
billionaires_df <- read_tsv("~/R_BEGINNERS_SHORT/datasets_ATRIUM/billionaires_combined.tsv")
```

## Plot the mean daily income in each region over time. 

```{r}
#| echo: false
billionaires_df %>% 
  group_by(world_6region, time) %>% 
  summarize(mean_daily_income = mean(daily_income)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x = time, y = mean_daily_income, color = world_6region))
```
